text: Lodano is a village and former municipality of the district of Vallemaggia in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. On 4 April 2004 the former municipalities of Aurigeno, Coglio, Giumaglio, Lodano, Moghegno and Someo merged into the municipality of Maggia. Category:2004 disestablishments in Switzerland Category:Former municipalities of Ticino Category:Villages in Ticino
title: Lodano
